imdb.plot outline: In 1937, the Japanese imperialists launched a brutal war of aggression against China, the Chinese nation has entered a critical period of vital importance. Xu day was originally an ordinary small accounting color blind, an accident involving a patriot and the Japanese War, he was touched by the patriotic spirit, so he used his sharp mind to help the Patriots transporting important materials. During this period, he met Jin and Tielin, they have complex background, and met the beautiful woman Tian Dan.In the troubled times, the legend of Shanghai, Xu Tian not only witnessed, but also will participate in the important moment of historical change......
imdb.title: The Red
plot: In 1937, the Japanese imperialists launched a brutal war of aggression against China, the Chinese nation has entered a critical period of vital importance. Xu day was originally an ordinary small accounting color blind, an accident involving a patriot and the Japanese War, he was touched by the patriotic spirit, so he used his sharp mind to help the Patriots transporting important materials. During this period, he met Jin and Tielin, they have complex background, and met the beautiful woman Tian Dan.In the troubled times, the legend of Shanghai, Xu Tian not only witnessed, but also will participate in the important moment of historical change......
